day name: The Holy Theophany of our Lord, God and Saviour Jesus Christ
troparia: (Tone 1) When You, O Lord, were baptized in the Jordan,* worship of the Trinity was revealed;* the voice of the Father bore witness to You,* naming You the beloved Son,* and the Spirit in the form of a dove confirmed the wordâ€™s certainty.* Glory to You, O Christ God,* who appeared and enlightened the world.
kontakia: (Tone 4) Today, You have appeared to the world* and Your light, O Lord, has been signed on us,* who with knowledge sing Your praises.* You have come, You have appeared, O unapproachable Light.
specialDismissal: Who, for our salvation, willed to be baptized in the Jordan by John,
